Episodes.Title: Gay Witch Hunt
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Ricky Gervais, Stephen Merchant
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael apologizes to Oscar, after he finds out he's gay, for calling him a homosexual slur--but his apology outs Oscar to the entire office. And Jim decides to take a promotion at the Stamford office.

Episodes.Title: The Convention
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Lee Eisenberg, Gene Stupnitsky
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael and Dwight go to a convention in Philadelphia and run into Jim, and Michael becomes jealous of Jim's relationship with his new boss. Meanwhile, Pam gets ready for her first date since her engagement.

Episodes.Title: The Coup
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Paul Lieberstein, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael is in trouble once again as Jan busts him for declaring it's "Movie Monday" where everyone watches a movie and neglects work. Angela pushes Dwight to make a move on Michael's job while Pam and Jim find creative ways to was...

Episodes.Title: Grief Counseling
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Jennifer Celotta, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael takes on the role of office grief counselor when he learns that his old boss has died.

Episodes.Title: Initiation
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, B.J. Novak, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Dwight takes former temp Ryan to his beet farm to initiate Ryan to his new job at Dunder Mifflin.

Episodes.Title: Diwali
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Mindy Kaling, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael encourages the entire Scranton branch to support Kelly and attend a local celebration of Diwali, the Hindu Festival of Lights. Meanwhile, Andy convinces Jim to turn a late night of work into a drinking game.

Episodes.Title: Branch Closing
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: When Jan tells Michael that the Scranton Branch will be shutting down, Michael strives to keep his staff's spirits up. Meanwhile, everyone privately begins to envision how their lives will change in the aftermath.

Episodes.Title: The Merger
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Brent Forrester, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Jan informs Michael that the Scanton branch of Dunder Mifflin will be merging with the Stamford Branch. Jim and Pam are reunited while the other employees of both branches must adjust to their new co-workers.

Episodes.Title: The Convict
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Ricky Gervais, Stephen Merchant
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: Michael learns that one of the new employees at Dunder Mifflin Scranton has a criminal record. Meanwhile, Jim helps Andy make a move on Pam.

Episodes.Title: A Benihana Christmas
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Jennifer Celotta, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Trouble among the members of the party planning committee results with Pam and Karen hosting a rival Christmas party, but Michael isn't interested in celebrating after being dumped by Carol.

Episodes.Title: Back from Vacation
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Justin Spitzer, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael isn't supposed to let anyone know that he and Jan went on vacation together in Jamaica, but he accidentally circulates a compromising photo of them to the office via e-mail.

Episodes.Title: Traveling Salesmen
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Lee Eisenberg
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Dwight does a favor for Angela to keep her from getting in trouble. Andy finds out and uses it against him to get in tighter with Michael. Now Dwight must fess up, which will reveal his relationship with Angela, or risk getting fi...

Episodes.Title: The Return
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Lee Eisenberg, Gene Stupnitsky
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Andy does the impossible--he makes everyone in the office miss Dwight, who is forced to take a job at Staples. Meanwhile, Oscar comes back to the office and Michael predictably throws a stereotypical Mexican party to celebrate.

Episodes.Title: Ben Franklin
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Mindy Kaling, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael asks Jim to get a male stripper for Phyllis's office bachelorette party, but he gets a Ben Franklin impersonator instead. Meanwhile, the men's bachelor party goes as planned until Michael becomes uncomfortable with the str...

Episodes.Title: Phyllis' Wedding
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Caroline Williams, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael exaggerates the importance of his small role in Phyllis's wedding and makes an ass out of himself, and Pam notices that Phyllis stole all of her wedding ideas from her original wedding plans.

Episodes.Title: Business School
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Brent Forrester, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael is a guest speaker for Ryan's business class, but they have a falling out after Michael finds out that Ryan spoke negatively about Dunder Mifflin. Back at the office, Dwight tries to kill a bat that he found in the ceiling.

Episodes.Title: Cocktails
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Paul Lieberstein, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: While Michael and Jan go to their first Dunder Mifflin outing as an official couple, the office workers left behind go out for happy hour. During happy hour, Roy finds out that Jim and Pam kissed on Casino Night.

Episodes.Title: The Negotiation
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Dwight saves Jim from an attack by Roy, but Dwight won't allow Jim to thank him for it. Meanwhile, Darryl asks Michael for a pay raise, and Michael discovers that he is woefully underpaid--so Michael goes to headquarters to ask fo...

Episodes.Title: Safety Training
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, B.J. Novak, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Andy returns to the office after weeks of anger management training, determined to make a fresh start with all the Dunder-Mifflin employees. Meanwhile, it's safety training day in the office, and Michael and Dwight are on a missio...

Episodes.Title: Product Recall
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Brent Forrester, Justin Spitzer
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael tries to be proactive during a watermark crisis, but only makes the situation worse. Meanwhile, Angela has trouble being apologetic with customers, and Andy discovers a secret about his new girlfriend.

Episodes.Title: Women's Appreciation
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Gene Stupnitsky, Lee Eisenberg
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Phyllis gets flashed in the parking lot, and Dwight goes all out to secure the premises. Michael ostensibly takes the women in the office to the mall to comfort them, but he's really doing it to get advice about breaking up with Jan.

Episodes.Title: Beach Games
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Jennifer Celotta, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael uses "beach day" at Dunder-Mifflin to find out which employee would be his most capable replacement, just in case he receives the promotion to the New York office that he's applied for.

Episodes.Title: The Job
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Paul Lieberstein, Michael Schur
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael appoints Dwight as regional manager, anticipating that he will receive the job at corporate. Jim and Karen also interview for the same position. And Michael gets back together with Jan after she gets a boob job.
